00029 Cone::Cone(const Transform &o2w, bool ro,
00030            float ht, float rad, float tm )
00031         : Shape(o2w, ro) {

00033         height = ht;

00036 BBox Cone::ObjectBound() const {
00037         Point p1 = Point( -radius, -radius, 0 );
00038         Point p2 = Point(  radius,  radius, height );
00039         return BBox( p1, p2 );

00041 bool Cone::Intersect(const Ray &r, float *tHit,
00042                 DifferentialGeometry *dg) const {
00043         float phi;
00044         Point phit;
00045         // Transform _Ray_ to object space
00046         Ray ray;
00047         WorldToObject(r, &ray);
00048         // Compute quadratic cone coefficients
00049         float k = radius / height;
00050         k = k*k;
00051         float A = ray.d.x * ray.d.x + ray.d.y * ray.d.y -
00052                 k * ray.d.z * ray.d.z;
00053         float B = 2 * (ray.d.x * ray.o.x + ray.d.y * ray.o.y -
00054                 k * ray.d.z * (ray.o.z-height) );
00055         float C = ray.o.x * ray.o.x + ray.o.y * ray.o.y -
00056                 k * (ray.o.z -height) * (ray.o.z-height);
00057         // Solve quadratic equation for _t_ values
00058         float t0, t1;
00059         if (!Quadratic(A, B, C, &t0, &t1))
00060                 return false;
00061         // Compute intersection distance along ray
00062         if (t0 > ray.maxt || t1 < ray.mint)
00063                 return false;
00064         float thit = t0;
00065         if (t0 < ray.mint) {
00066                 thit = t1;
00067                 if (thit > ray.maxt) return false;
00068         }
00069         // Compute cone inverse mapping
00070         phit = ray(thit);
00071         phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00072         if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00073         // Test cone intersection against clipping parameters
00074         if (phit.z < 0 || phit.z > height || phi > phiMax) {
00075                 if (thit == t1) return false;
00076                 thit = t1;
00077                 if (t1 > ray.maxt) return false;
00078                 // Compute cone inverse mapping
00079                 phit = ray(thit);
00080                 phi = atan2f(phit.y, phit.x);
00081                 if (phi < 0.) phi += 2.f*M_PI;
00082                 if (phit.z < 0 || phit.z > height || phi > phiMax)
00083                         return false;
00084         }
00085         // Find parametric representation of cone hit
00086         float u = phi / phiMax;
00087         float v = phit.z / height;
00088         // Compute cone \dpdu and \dpdv
00089         Vector dpdu(-phiMax * phit.y, phiMax * phit.x, 0);
00090         Vector dpdv(-phit.x / (1.f - v),
00091                     -phit.y / (1.f - v), height);
00092         // Compute cone \dndu and \dndv
00093         Vector d2Pduu = -phiMax * phiMax *
00094                         Vector(phit.x, phit.y, 0.);
00095         Vector d2Pduv = phiMax / (1.f - v) *
00096                         Vector(-phit.y, -phit.x, 0.);
00097         Vector d2Pdvv(0, 0, 0);
00098         // Compute coefficients for fundamental forms
00099         float E = Dot(dpdu, dpdu);
00100         float F = Dot(dpdu, dpdv);
00101         float G = Dot(dpdv, dpdv);
00102         Vector N = Normalize(Cross(dpdu, dpdv));
00103         float e = Dot(N, d2Pduu);
00104         float f = Dot(N, d2Pduv);
00105         float g = Dot(N, d2Pdvv);
00106         // Compute \dndu and \dndv from fundamental form coefficients
00107         float invEGF2 = 1.f / (E*G - F*F);
00108         Vector dndu = (f*F - e*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00109                 (e*F - f*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00110         Vector dndv = (g*F - f*G) * invEGF2 * dpdu +
00111                 (f*F - g*E) * invEGF2 * dpdv;
00112         // Initialize _DifferentialGeometry_ from parametric information
00113         *dg = DifferentialGeometry(ObjectToWorld(phit),
00114                                    ObjectToWorld(dpdu),
00115                                                            ObjectToWorld(dpdv),
00116                                    ObjectToWorld(dndu),
00117                                                            ObjectToWorld(dndv),
00118                                    u, v, this);
00119         // Update _tHit_ for quadric intersection
00120         *tHit = thit;
00121         return true;
00122 }

00169 float Cone::Area() const {
00170         return phiMax*height*height*
00171                 sqrtf((height*height)+
00172                       (radius*radius))/(2.0f*radius);
00173 }
